attributes.action: Put India back on the red list.
attributes.additional_details: We have just started seeing a decline in cases here, putting India on the Amber list means people coming from there won't be required to quarantine. This is going to cause another surge in cases, those of us who have lost family members do not want to take this risk again.
attributes.background: India needs to go back on the red list. We already made this mistake before by not putting them on the red list earlier. Changing the name of the variant doesn't change where it came from.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition we currently have open on this topic:

India to be added to red list for travel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582026
